tns:service.tagline: Monitor the performance of IT services
tns:service.description: Service Monitoring keeps an eye on the performance of your IT services and quickly detects and resolves any issues. The service monitors the infrastructure by collecting the monitoring data generated by functional probes. The raw data is merged into statistics and available through the user interface in a user-friendly way. This service builds on EGI’s ten years’ experience of monitoring distributed e-infrastructures. With Service Monitoring you will get: - Minimal development effort for setting up monitoring services - Ready-to-use user interface - Automated reporting tools
tns:service.targetUsers: Customer: EGI service providers User: EGI users
tns:service.userValue: Improve the quality of the services, and prove to customers/funders the quality of service achieved
tns:service.fundingSources: Development: EC H2020 projects (primarily) and national projects/open source projects. Operations: EGI participant fees + in-kind contribution from service providers
